    • Constructor Detail

      • BitwiseAndOr

        public BitwiseAndOr​(boolean isOr,
                    int nbits)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        BitwiseAndOr of inputs[0,...,nbits-1] and inputs[nbits,...,2xnbits -1]. So we do inputs[i] AND/Or inputs[nbits + i], for all i in [0,nbits-1]. The number of output wires is of course nbits
        Parameters:
        isOr -
        nbits -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
